member.name: P:Discord.Channel.Id
member.summary: Returns the unique identifier for this channel.

member.name: P:Discord.Channel.Name
member.summary: Returns the name of this channel.

member.name: P:Discord.Channel.Position
member.summary: Returns the position of this channel in the channel list for this server.

member.name: P:Discord.Channel.IsPrivate
member.summary: Returns false is this is a public chat and true if this is a private chat with another user (see Recipient).

member.name: P:Discord.Channel.Type
member.summary: Returns the type of this channel (see ChannelTypes).

member.name: P:Discord.Channel.ServerId
member.summary: Returns the id of the server containing this channel.

member.name: P:Discord.Channel.Server
member.summary: Returns the server containing this channel.

members.member: For private chats, returns the Id of the target user, otherwise null.
For private chats, returns the target user, otherwise null.

member.name: P:Discord.Channel.Messages
member.summary: Returns a collection of all messages the client has in cache.
member.remarks: This collection does not guarantee any ordering.

member.name: P:Discord.Channel.PermissionOverwrites
member.summary: Returns a collection of all custom permissions used for this channel.

member.name: F:Discord.ChannelTypes.Text
member.summary: A text-only channel.

member.name: F:Discord.ChannelTypes.Voice
member.summary: A voice-only channel.

member.name: M:Discord.DiscordClient.CreateInvite(Discord.Server,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new invite to the default channel of the provided server.
member.param: Time (in seconds) until the invite expires. Set to 0 to never expire.
If true, a user accepting this invite will be kicked from the server after closing their client.
If true, creates a human-readable link. Not supported if maxAge is set to 0.
The max amount of times this invite may be used.

member.name: M:Discord.DiscordClient.CreateInvite(Discord.Channel,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new invite to the provided channel.
member.param: Time (in seconds) until the invite expires. Set to 0 to never expire.
If true, a user accepting this invite will be kicked from the server after closing their client.
If true, creates a human-readable link. Not supported if maxAge is set to 0.
The max amount of times this invite may be used.

member.name: M:Discord.DiscordClient.CreateInvite(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new invite to the provided channel.
member.param: Time (in seconds) until the invite expires. Set to 0 to never expire.
If true, a user accepting this invite will be kicked from the server after closing their client.
If true, creates a human-readable link. Not supported if maxAge is set to 0.
The max amount of times this invite may be used.

member.summary: Gets more info about the provided invite.
member.remarks: Supported formats: inviteCode, xkcdCode, https://discord.gg/inviteCode, https://discord.gg/xkcdCode

member.name: M:Discord.DiscordClient.SendFile(Discord.Channel,System.IO.Stream,System.String)
member.summary: Reads a stream and sends it to the provided channel as a file.
member.remarks: It is highly recommended that this stream be cached in memory or on disk, or the request may time out.

member.name: M:Discord.DiscordClient.SendFile(System.String,System.IO.Stream,System.String)
member.summary: Reads a stream and sends it to the provided channel as a file.
member.remarks: It is highly recommended that this stream be cached in memory or on disk, or the request may time out.

member.name: P:Discord.DiscordClient.Users
member.summary: Returns a collection of all users the client can see across all servers.
member.remarks: This collection does not guarantee any ordering.

member.name: P:Discord.DiscordClient.Servers
member.summary: Returns a collection of all servers the client is a member of.
member.remarks: This collection does not guarantee any ordering.

member.name: P:Discord.DiscordClient.Channels
member.summary: Returns a collection of all channels the client can see across all servers.
member.remarks: This collection does not guarantee any ordering.

member.name: P:Discord.DiscordClient.Messages
member.summary: Returns a collection of all messages the client has in cache.
member.remarks: This collection does not guarantee any ordering.

member.name: P:Discord.DiscordClient.Roles
member.summary: Returns a collection of all roles the client can see across all servers.
member.remarks: This collection does not guarantee any ordering.

member.name: M:Discord.DiscordClient.GetUser(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the user with the specified id, or null if none was found.

member.name: M:Discord.DiscordClient.GetUser(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the user with the specified name and discriminator, or null if none was found.
member.remarks: Name formats supported: Name and @Name. Search is case-insensitive.

member.name: M:Discord.DiscordClient.FindUsers(System.String)
member.summary: Returns all users with the specified name across all servers.
member.remarks: Name formats supported: Name and @Name. Search is case-insensitive.

member.name: M:Discord.DiscordClient.GetMember(System.String,Discord.User)
member.summary: Returns the user with the specified id, along with their server-specific data, or null if none was found.

member.name: M:Discord.DiscordClient.GetMember(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the user with the specified id, along with their server-specific data, or null if none was found.

member.name: M:Discord.DiscordClient.GetMember(Discord.Server,Discord.User)
member.summary: Returns the user with the specified id, along with their server-specific data, or null if none was found.

member.name: M:Discord.DiscordClient.GetMember(Discord.Server,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the user with the specified id, along with their server-specific data, or null if none was found.

member.name: M:Discord.DiscordClient.FindMembers(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns all users in with the specified server and name, along with their server-specific data.
member.remarks: Name formats supported: Name and @Name. Search is case-insensitive.

member.name: M:Discord.DiscordClient.FindMembers(Discord.Server,System.String)
member.summary: Returns all users in with the specified server and name, along with their server-specific data.
member.remarks: Name formats supported: Name and @Name. Search is case-insensitive.

member.name: M:Discord.DiscordClient.GetServer(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the server with the specified id, or null if none was found.

member.name: M:Discord.DiscordClient.FindServers(System.String)
member.summary: Returns all servers with the specified name.
member.remarks: Search is case-insensitive.

member.name: M:Discord.DiscordClient.GetChannel(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the channel with the specified id, or null if none was found.

member.summary: Returns the private channel with the provided user, creating one if it does not currently exist.

member.name: M:Discord.DiscordClient.GetPMChannel(Discord.User)
member.summary: Returns the private channel with the provided user, creating one if it does not currently exist.

member.summary: Returns all roles with the specified server and name.

member.name: M:Discord.DiscordClient.GetMessage(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the message with the specified id, or null if none was found.

member.name: P:Discord.DiscordClient.User
member.summary: Returns the User object for the current logged in user.

member.name: P:Discord.DiscordClient.IsConnected
member.summary: Returns true if the user has successfully logged in and the websocket connection has been established.

member.name: P:Discord.DiscordClient.IsClosing
member.summary: Returns true if this client was requested to disconnect.

member.name: P:Discord.DiscordClient.CloseToken
member.summary: Returns a cancel token that is triggered when a disconnect is requested.

member.name: M:Discord.DiscordClient.#ctor(Discord.DiscordClientConfig)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DiscordClient class.

member.name: M:Discord.DiscordClient.Connect(System.String)
member.summary: Connects to the Discord server with the provided token.

member.name: M:Discord.DiscordClient.Connect(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Connects to the Discord server with the provided email and password.
member.returns: Returns a token for future connections.

member.name: M:Discord.DiscordClient.Connect(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Connects to the Discord server with the provided token, and will fall back to username and password.
member.returns: Returns a token for future connections.

member.name: M:Discord.DiscordClient.ConnectAnonymous(System.String)
member.summary: Connects to the Discord server as an anonymous user with the provided username.
member.returns: Returns a token for future connections.

member.name: M:Discord.DiscordClient.Disconnect
member.summary: Disconnects from the Discord server, canceling any pending requests.

member.name: M:Discord.DiscordClient.Block
member.summary: Blocking call that will not return until client has been stopped. This is mainly intended for use in console applications.

member.name: P:Discord.DiscordClientConfig.EnableVoice
member.summary: Enables the voice websocket and UDP client (Experimental!).
member.remarks: This option requires the opus .dll or .so be in the local lib/ folder.

member.name: P:Discord.DiscordClientConfig.EnableDebug
member.summary: Enables the verbose DebugMessage event handler. May hinder performance but should help debug any issues.

member.name: P:Discord.DiscordClientConfig.ConnectionTimeout
member.summary: Max time in milliseconds to wait for the web socket to connect.

member.name: P:Discord.DiscordClientConfig.VoiceConnectionTimeout
member.summary: Max time in milliseconds to wait for the voice web socket to connect.

member.name: P:Discord.DiscordClientConfig.ReconnectDelay
member.summary: Gets or sets the time (in milliseconds) to wait after an unexpected disconnect before reconnecting.

member.name: P:Discord.DiscordClientConfig.FailedReconnectDelay
member.summary: Gets or sets the time (in milliseconds) to wait after an reconnect fails before retrying.

member.name: P:Discord.DiscordClientConfig.WebSocketInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the time (in milliseconds) to wait when the websocket's message queue is empty before checking again.

member.name: P:Discord.DiscordClientConfig.UseMessageQueue
member.summary: Enables or disables the internal message queue. This will allow SendMessage to return immediately and handle messages internally. Messages will set the IsQueued and HasFailed properties to show their progress.

member.name: P:Discord.DiscordClientConfig.MessageQueueInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the time (in milliseconds) to wait when the message queue is empty before checking again.

member.name: P:Discord.Invite.Id
member.summary: Returns the unique identifier for this invite.

member.name: P:Discord.Invite.MaxAge
member.summary: Time (in seconds) until the invite expires. Set to 0 to never expire.

member.name: P:Discord.Invite.Uses
member.summary: The amount of times this invite has been used.

member.name: P:Discord.Invite.MaxUses
member.summary: The max amount of times this invite may be used.

member.name: P:Discord.Invite.IsRevoked
member.summary: Returns true if this invite has been destroyed, or you are banned from that server.

member.name: P:Discord.Invite.IsTemporary
member.summary: If true, a user accepting this invite will be kicked from the server after closing their client.

member.name: P:Discord.Invite.XkcdPass
member.summary: Returns, if enabled, an alternative human-readable code for URLs.

member.name: P:Discord.Invite.Url
member.summary: Returns a URL for this invite using XkcdPass if available or Id if not.

member.name: P:Discord.Invite.InviterId
member.summary: Returns the id of the user that created this invite.

member.name: P:Discord.Invite.Inviter
member.summary: Returns the user that created this invite.

member.name: P:Discord.Invite.ServerId
member.summary: Returns the id of the server this invite is to.

member.name: P:Discord.Invite.Server
member.summary: Returns the server this invite is to.

member.name: P:Discord.Invite.ChannelId
member.summary: Returns the id of the channel this invite is to.

member.name: P:Discord.Invite.Channel
member.summary: Returns the channel this invite is to.

member.name: P:Discord.Membership.GameId
member.summary: Returns the id for the game this user is currently playing.

member.name: P:Discord.Membership.Status
member.summary: Returns the current status for this user.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.Attachment.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier for this file.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.Attachment.Size
member.summary: Size, in bytes, of this file file.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.Attachment.Filename
member.summary: Filename of this file.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.Embed.Url
member.summary: URL of this embed.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.Embed.Type
member.summary: Type of this embed.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.Embed.Title
member.summary: Title for this embed.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.Embed.Description
member.summary: Summary of this embed.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.Embed.Author
member.summary: Returns information about the author of this embed.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.Embed.Provider
member.summary: Returns information about the providing website of this embed.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.Embed.Thumbnail
member.summary: Returns the thumbnail of this embed.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.EmbedReference.Url
member.summary: URL of this embed provider.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.EmbedReference.Name
member.summary: Name of this embed provider.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.File.Url
member.summary: Download url for this file.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.File.ProxyUrl
member.summary: Preview url for this file.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.File.Width
member.summary: Width of the this file, if it is an image.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.File.Height
member.summary: Height of this file, if it is an image.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.Id
member.summary: Returns the global unique identifier for this message.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.Nonce
member.summary: Returns the local unique identifier for this message.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.IsMentioningMe
member.summary: Returns true if the logged-in user was mentioned.
member.remarks: This is not set to true if the user was mentioned with @everyone (see IsMentioningEverone).

member.name: P:Discord.Message.IsMentioningEveryone
member.summary: Returns true if @everyone was mentioned by someone with permissions to do so.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.IsTTS
member.summary: Returns true if the message was sent as text-to-speech by someone with permissions to do so.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.IsQueued
member.summary: Returns true if the message is still in the outgoing message queue.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.HasFailed
member.summary: Returns true if the message was rejected by the server.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.RawText
member.summary: Returns the raw content of this message as it was received from the server..

member.name: P:Discord.Message.Text
member.summary: Returns the content of this message with any special references such as mentions converted.
member.remarks: This value is lazy loaded and only processed on first request. Each subsequent request will pull from cache.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.Timestamp
member.summary: Returns the timestamp for when this message was sent.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.EditedTimestamp
member.summary: Returns the timestamp for when this message was last edited.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.Attachments
member.summary: Returns the attachments included in this message.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.Embeds
member.summary: Returns a collection of all embeded content in this message.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.MentionIds
member.summary: Returns a collection of all user ids mentioned in this message.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.Mentions
member.summary: Returns a collection of all users mentioned in this message.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.ChannelId
member.summary: Returns the id of the channel this message was sent in.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.Channel
member.summary: Returns the the channel this message was sent in.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.UserId
member.summary: Returns the id of the author of this message.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.User
member.summary: Returns the author of this message.

member.name: P:Discord.Message.IsAuthor
member.summary: Returns true if the current user created this message.

member.name: P:Discord.PackedPermissions.General_CreateInstantInvite
member.summary: If True, a user may create invites.

member.name: P:Discord.PackedPermissions.General_BanMembers
member.summary: If True, a user may ban users from the server.

member.name: P:Discord.PackedPermissions.General_KickMembers
member.summary: If True, a user may kick users from the server.

member.name: P:Discord.PackedPermissions.General_ManageRoles
member.summary: If True, a user may adjust roles. This also bypasses all other permissions, granting all the others.

member.name: P:Discord.PackedPermissions.General_ManageChannels
member.summary: If True, a user may create, delete and modify channels.

member.name: P:Discord.PackedPermissions.General_ManageServer
member.summary: If True, a user may adjust server properties.

member.name: P:Discord.PackedPermissions.Text_ReadMessages
member.summary: If True, a user may join channels.
member.remarks: Note that without this permission, a channel is not sent by the server.

member.name: P:Discord.PackedPermissions.Text_SendMessages
member.summary: If True, a user may send messages.

member.name: P:Discord.PackedPermissions.Text_SendTTSMessages
member.summary: If True, a user may send text-to-speech messages.

member.name: P:Discord.PackedPermissions.Text_ManageMessages
member.summary: If True, a user may delete messages.

member.name: P:Discord.PackedPermissions.Text_EmbedLinks
member.summary: If True, Discord will auto-embed links sent by this user.

member.name: P:Discord.PackedPermissions.Text_AttachFiles
member.summary: If True, a user may send files.

member.name: P:Discord.PackedPermissions.Text_ReadMessageHistory
member.summary: If True, a user may read previous messages.

member.name: P:Discord.PackedPermissions.Text_MentionEveryone
member.summary: If True, a user may mention @everyone.

member.name: P:Discord.PackedPermissions.Voice_Connect
member.summary: If True, a user may connect to a voice channel.

member.name: P:Discord.PackedPermissions.Voice_Speak
member.summary: If True, a user may speak in a voice channel.

member.name: P:Discord.PackedPermissions.Voice_MuteMembers
member.summary: If True, a user may mute users.

member.name: P:Discord.PackedPermissions.Voice_DeafenMembers
member.summary: If True, a user may deafen users.

member.name: P:Discord.PackedPermissions.Voice_MoveMembers
member.summary: If True, a user may move other users between voice channels.

member.name: P:Discord.PackedPermissions.Voice_UseVoiceActivation
member.summary: If True, a user may use voice activation rather than push-to-talk.

member.summary: Returns the user that first created this server.

member.name: P:Discord.Server.Bans
member.summary: Returns a collection of all users banned on this server.

member.summary: Returns the time this user last sent a message.

member.name: T:Discord.Opus.Application
member.summary: Supported coding modes.

member.name: F:Discord.Opus.Application.Voip
member.summary: Gives best quality at a given bitrate for voice signals. It enhances the input signal by high-pass filtering and emphasizing formants and harmonics. Optionally it includes in-band forward error correction to protect against packet loss. Use this mode for typical VoIP applications. Because of the enhancement, even at high bitrates the output may sound different from the input.

member.name: F:Discord.Opus.Application.Audio
member.summary: Gives best quality at a given bitrate for most non-voice signals like music. Use this mode for music and mixed (music/voice) content, broadcast, and applications requiring less than 15 ms of coding delay.

member.name: F:Discord.Opus.Application.Restricted_LowLatency
member.summary: Low-delay mode that disables the speech-optimized mode in exchange for slightly reduced delay.

member.name: F:Discord.Opus.Error.OK
member.summary: No error.

member.name: F:Discord.Opus.Error.BadArg
member.summary: One or more invalid/out of range arguments.

member.name: F:Discord.Opus.Error.BufferToSmall
member.summary: The mode struct passed is invalid.

member.name: F:Discord.Opus.Error.InternalError
member.summary: An internal error was detected.

member.name: F:Discord.Opus.Error.InvalidPacket
member.summary: The compressed data passed is corrupted.

member.name: F:Discord.Opus.Error.Unimplemented
member.summary: Invalid/unsupported request number.

member.name: F:Discord.Opus.Error.InvalidState
member.summary: An encoder or decoder structure is invalid or already freed.

member.name: F:Discord.Opus.Error.AllocFail
member.summary: Memory allocation has failed.

member.name: M:Discord.Opus.OpusEncoder.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,Discord.Opus.Application)
member.summary: Creates a new Opus encoder.
member.param: Sampling rate of the input signal (Hz). Supported Values: 8000, 12000, 16000, 24000, or 48000.
Number of channels (1 or 2) in input signal.
Length, in milliseconds, that each frame takes. Supported Values: 2.5, 5, 10, 20, 40, 60
Coding mode.

member.summary: Produces Opus encoded audio from PCM samples.
member.param: PCM samples to encode.
Length of encoded audio.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether Forward Error Correction is enabled.
